law.catch_line: Licensed professional art therapy practice board fund.
law.text: There is hereby created in the State Treasury the licensed professional art therapy practice board fund. All funds received by the board under the provisions of KRS 309.133 to 309.137 shall be deposited with the State Treasurer for credit to the licensed professional art therapy board fund. The State Treasurer shall invest the fund as all other state funds are invested and income from investment of the fund shall be credited to the fund. The balance remaining in the fund at the end of any fiscal year shall not revert to the general fund. The money in the licensed professional art therapy board fund shall be appropriated to the board and shall be used for the purpose of carrying out the provisions of KRS 309.130 to 309.1399.
law.history: Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 48, sec. 9, effective June 25, 2009. -- Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 337, sec. 8, effective July 15, 1994.
